description:
This course is about learning the basics of forex trading , and how to use the Meta Trader 4 platform as well.

The course is divided to 3 sections :

  1. Before we start - in this section we will learn how to download the MT4 platform as well as how to Open Demo and Live account.
  2. Forex Basics - in this section we will describe the main terminologies and basics of forex trading that you need to know before start trading.
  3. Learning How to use Meta Trader 4 - in this section we will see how to use the main features of the Meta Trader 4 platform to be able to manage your account.

The course is in 12 videos supported with description and links to open Demo account and Live account.
title: Forex basics and using Meta Trader 4
